Create a unique printer design that can print on both sides of the paper at once, saving time and resources.
Develop a mobile app that allows users to easily print from their smartphones, making printing more convenient than ever before.
Create a sustainable printer model that uses recycled materials and produces minimal waste.
Design a printer that can print in multiple colors simultaneously, allowing for more vibrant and colorful prints.
Develop a printer that can print 3D objects using advanced printing technology, expanding the possibilities of what can be printed.
